articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Fintech firm Pine Labs weighs $1-bn IPO, may seek $6-bn valuation: Report - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Pine Labs may issue both new and secondary shares, they said. It could also opt to do a pre-IPO fundraising round ahead of any listing, two of the people said.
articles.content: Pine Labs Pvt, an Asian digital payments provider backed by Peak XV Partners and Mastercard Inc., is considering raising about $1 billion in an initial public offering in India, people familiar with … [+1479 chars]
